title: Samsung unveils two premium soundbars with 3D surround sound, Dolby Atmos and Q-Symphony
content:
To accompany its 2022 Neo QLED 8K TV lineup, Samsung has announced two premium soundbars: HW-Q990B and HW-S800B. The latest soundbars promise to deliver an immersive sound experience and feature modern designs to complement your Samsung TV. Samsung HW-Q990B The HW-Q990B is the most premium and expensive of the duo. It delivers 3D surround sound

The post Samsung unveils two premium soundbars with 3D surround sound, Dolby Atmos and Q-Symphony appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung has launched its 2022 soundbar lineup in South Korea with the HW-Q990B and HW-S800B. Read on to know more.
